spec.description: Reports Mastodon version data and patch adoption

spec.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM mastodon_domains;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT latest AS software_version
  FROM release_versions
  WHERE status IN ('release', 'main')
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT md.software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM release_versions rv
    WHERE rv.status = 'eol'
      AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '.%'
  )
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT md.domain) AS total_domains,
    COALESCE(SUM(md.active_users_monthly), 0) AS total_users,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (
      WHERE md.software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check)
         OR md.software_version NOT IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases)
    ) AS unpatched_or_eol_domains,
    COALESCE(SUM(md.active_users_monthly) FILTER (
      WHERE md.software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check)
         OR md.software_version NOT IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases)
    ), 0) AS unpatched_or_eol_users
  FROM mastodon_domains md
)
SELECT
  ((total_domains - unpatched_or_eol_domains) * 100.0 / NULLIF(total_domains, 0)) AS "Instances",
  ((total_users   - unpatched_or_eol_users)   * 100.0 / NULLIF(total_users, 0))   AS "MAU"
FROM agg;

spec.description: Instances running a supported branch with the latest patches applied.
spec.title: Patch Coverage

spec.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT md.domain) FILTER (
    WHERE md."timestamp" <= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
  ) AS "1 Hour+",
  COUNT(DISTINCT md.domain) FILTER (
    WHERE md."timestamp" <= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
  ) AS "24 Hours+",
  COUNT(DISTINCT md.domain) FILTER (
    WHERE md."timestamp" <= NOW() - INTERVAL '48 hours'
  ) AS "48 Hours+"
FROM raw_domains rd
INNER JOIN mastodon_domains md
  ON rd.domain = md.domain
WHERE rd.reason IS NOT NULL;

spec.description: Domains that returned an error on their last scan.
spec.title: Instances w/ Stale Data

spec.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT latest
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

spec.description: Count of instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.
spec.title: Patched Instances, Main

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    COUNT(*) AS "Instances"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version =
(
    SELECT latest
    FROM release_versions
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

spec.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-0 (latest), compared to the total instances on branch release-0.
spec.title: Patched Instances, Latest

spec.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched" 
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT latest || '%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

spec.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-1 (previous), compared to the total instances on branch release-1.
spec.title: Patched Instances, Previous

spec.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT latest || '%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM release_versions
WHERE n_level = -1
);

spec.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.
spec.title: Patched MAUs, Main

spec.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version =
(
    SELECT latest
    FROM release_versions
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM release_versions
WHERE n_level = 0
);

spec.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for branch release-0 (latest), compared to the total instances on branch release-0.
spec.title: Patched MAUs, Latest

spec.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT latest || '%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM release_versions
WHERE n_level = 1
);

spec.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for branch release-1 (previous), compared to the MAUs on branch release-1.
spec.title: Patched MAUs, Previous

spec.rawSql: SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_users FROM mastodon_domains;

spec.description: Based on the total count of reported monthly active users (MAU) of all visible Mastodon instances.
spec.title: Mastodon Active Users (MAU)

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "Monthly Active Users"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY SUM(active_users_monthly) DESC
LIMIT 10;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT latest AS software_version
  FROM release_versions
  WHERE status IN ('release', 'main')
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT md.software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM release_versions rv
    WHERE rv.status = 'eol'
      AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '.%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH prefixes AS (
    SELECT branch 
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE status IN ('release', 'main')
),
matched AS (
    SELECT
        pv.branch AS prefix,
        COUNT(md.software_version) AS total
    FROM prefixes pv
    LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
      ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    GROUP BY pv.branch
),
eol AS (
    SELECT
        'EOL' AS prefix,
        COUNT(*) AS total
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM release_versions rv
        WHERE rv.status = 'eol'
          AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '%'
    )
)
SELECT * FROM matched
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM eol
ORDER BY prefix;

WITH prefixes AS (
    SELECT branch 
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE status IN ('release', 'main')
),
matched AS (
    SELECT
        pv.branch AS prefix,
        SUM(md.active_users_monthly) AS total_active_users
    FROM prefixes pv
    LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
      ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    GROUP BY pv.branch
),
eol AS (
    SELECT
        'EOL' AS prefix,
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_active_users
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM release_versions rv
        WHERE rv.status = 'eol'
          AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '%'
    )
)
SELECT * FROM matched
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM eol
ORDER BY prefix;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT latest AS software_version
  FROM release_versions
  WHERE status IN ('release', 'main')
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT md.software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM release_versions rv
    WHERE rv.status = 'eol'
      AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '.%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(active_users_monthly) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH recent_releases AS (
    SELECT 
        branch,
        n_level
    FROM release_versions
    WHERE status IN ('release', 'eol')
    ORDER BY n_level
    LIMIT 7
),
total_count AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) as total
    FROM mastodon_domains
    WHERE software_version IS NOT NULL
),
adoption_calc AS (
    SELECT
        rr.branch || '+' as version_label,
        rr.n_level,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM release_versions rv 
            WHERE rv.n_level <= rr.n_level 
            AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '%'
        ) THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / tc.total AS adoption_percent
    FROM recent_releases rr
    CROSS JOIN mastodon_domains md
    CROSS JOIN total_count tc
    WHERE md.software_version IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY rr.branch, rr.n_level, tc.total
)
SELECT 
    version_label,
    adoption_percent
FROM adoption_calc
ORDER BY n_level;

WITH recent_releases AS (
    -- Get the 7 most recent releases ordered by n_level
    SELECT 
        branch,
        n_level
    FROM release_versions
    WHERE status IN ('release', 'eol')
    ORDER BY n_level
    LIMIT 7
),
total_mau AS (
    SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as total
    FROM mastodon_domains
    WHERE software_version IS NOT NULL
      AND active_users_monthly IS NOT NULL
),
adoption_calc AS (
    SELECT
        rr.branch || '+' as version_label,
        rr.n_level,
        SUM(CASE WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM release_versions rv 
            WHERE rv.n_level <= rr.n_level 
            AND md.software_version LIKE rv.branch || '%'
        ) THEN md.active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / tm.total AS adoption_percent
    FROM recent_releases rr
    CROSS JOIN mastodon_domains md
    CROSS JOIN total_mau tm
    WHERE md.software_version IS NOT NULL
      AND md.active_users_monthly IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY rr.branch, rr.n_level, tm.total
)
SELECT 
    version_label,
    adoption_percent
FROM adoption_calc
ORDER BY n_level;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched" 
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT latest || '%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
    AND status != 'eol'
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
    AND status != 'eol'
);

spec.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-2 (deprecated) or older, compared to the instances on branch release-2 or older.
spec.title: Patched Instances, Deprecated

spec.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT latest || '%'
    FROM release_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM release_versions
WHERE n_level >= 1
);

spec.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on  instances running latest patches for branch release-2 (deprecated) or older, compared to the MAUs on branch release-2 or older.
spec.title: Patched MAUs, Deprecated

spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
    md.domain AS "Instances",
    md.software_version AS "Version",
    md.full_version AS "Raw Version",
    md.active_users_monthly AS "Monthly Active Users",
    md."timestamp" AS "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM dni
    WHERE md.domain LIKE '%' || dni.domain
)
ORDER BY md.active_users_monthly DESC;

spec.description: Instances which appear on the IFTAS DNI list are not reported on in detail, but may be included in the aggregated results above.
spec.title: All Instances

spec.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_patched_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_patched_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_patched_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_patched_instances AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_patched_mau AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_patched_mau AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_patched_mau AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_patched_mau AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_instances AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.eol_instances AS "EOL Branches"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_branch_mau AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_branch_mau AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_branch_mau AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_branch_mau AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.eol_branch_mau AS "EOL Branches"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

WITH prefixes AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT branch AS prefix
  FROM release_versions 
  WHERE branch IS NOT NULL
    AND status = 'eol'
),
matched AS (
  SELECT
    p.prefix,
    COUNT(md.software_version) AS total
  FROM prefixes p
  LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
    ON md.software_version LIKE p.prefix || '%'
  GROUP BY p.prefix
)
SELECT prefix, total
FROM matched
ORDER BY prefix;

spec.title: End of Life (EOL) Branch by Instances

spec.rawSql:
WITH prefixes AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT branch AS prefix
  FROM release_versions 
  WHERE branch IS NOT NULL
    AND status = 'eol'
),
matched AS (
  SELECT
    p.prefix,
    COALESCE(SUM(md.active_users_monthly), 0) AS total_active_users
  FROM prefixes p
  LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
    ON md.software_version LIKE p.prefix || '%'
  GROUP BY p.prefix
)
SELECT prefix, total_active_users
FROM matched
ORDER BY prefix;

spec.title: End of Life (EOL) Branch by MAUs
vmcrawl
